user.title: iPhone Alarms Sync
user.description:
Choose how to add your iPhone/iPad:

- **Mobile App devices** - Links to your HA mobile app device
- **Custom name** - Standalone device

select_mobile_app.title: Select Mobile App Device
select_mobile_app.description: Select your device from Mobile App integration.

custom_name.title: Enter Device Name
custom_name.description:
Enter a name for your iPhone/iPad (e.g., "John's iPhone").

This generates a **Phone ID** needed for the shortcut setup.

confirm.title: Setup Shortcuts
confirm.description:
**Phone ID:** `{phone_id}`

## Step 1: Import Shortcuts

### Sync Alarms Shortcut

Scan QR code or open link:

![QR Code]({sync_qr_code})

[Open Shortcut]({sync_shortcut_url})

When prompted, enter Phone ID: `{phone_id}`

### Event Shortcuts (Optional)

For tracking alarm events, import these shortcuts:

**Emit Alarm Event To HA Template** (for specific alarms):

![QR Code]({alarm_event_qr_code})

[Open Shortcut]({alarm_event_shortcut_url})

**Emit Device Event To HA Template** (for Wake-Up, any alarm, or sleep events):

![QR Code]({device_event_qr_code})

[Open Shortcut]({device_event_shortcut_url})

See Event Shortcuts Setup in options for detailed instructions.

## Step 2: Create Automation

1. Shortcuts app → Automation → +
2. App → Clock → Is Closed
3. Run Shortcut → "Sync Alarms With HA"
4. Enable "Run Immediately" → Done

event_shortcuts.title: Event Shortcuts Setup
event_shortcuts.description:
**Phone ID:** `{phone_id}`

## Shortcut 1: Emit Alarm Event To HA Template

For reporting events from **specific alarms** (requires alarm_id).

### Import

![QR Code]({alarm_event_qr_code})

[Open Shortcut]({alarm_event_shortcut_url})

### Import Questions

When importing, you'll be asked:
- **Enter Phone ID**: Use `{phone_id}`
- **Enter Event Type Number**: Choose 1 (Goes Off), 2 (Snoozed), or 3 (Stopped)
- **Enter Alarm ID**: Enter the alarm UUID (see list below)

### Personal Automation

1. Shortcuts app → Automation → +
2. Choose trigger (e.g., "When Alarm Goes Off")
3. Run Shortcut → "Emit Alarm Event To HA Template"
4. Enable "Run Immediately" → Done

## Shortcut 2: Emit Device Event To HA Template

For reporting events from **device-level alarms** (Wake-Up, any alarm, or sleep events).

### Import

![QR Code]({device_event_qr_code})

[Open Shortcut]({device_event_shortcut_url})

### Import Questions

When importing, you'll be asked:
- **Enter Phone ID**: Use `{phone_id}`
- **Enter Event Type Number**: Choose from:
  - 1-3: Wake-Up alarm (Goes Off, Snoozed, Stopped)
  - 4-6: Any alarm (Goes Off, Snoozed, Stopped)
  - 7: Bedtime starts
  - 8: Waking Up
  - 9: Wind Down starts

### Personal Automation

1. Shortcuts app → Automation → +
2. Choose trigger (e.g., "When Alarm Goes Off")
3. Run Shortcut → "Emit Device Event To HA Template"
4. Enable "Run Immediately" → Done
